mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_CASHFLOWSDLT (CASHFLOWSDLTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, ENTNAME, ENTCERTTYPE, ENTCERTNUM, SHEETYEAR, SHEETTYPE, SHEETTYPEDIVIDE, ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS,REPORTFLAG,ORG_CODE ) values (#{CashFlowsDltSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EntName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EntCertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EntCertNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SheetYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SheetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SheetTypeDivide,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{SourceSys,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_CASHFLOWSDLT set INFRECTYPE = #{InfRecType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTNAME = #{EntName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTCERTTYPE = #{EntCertType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTCERTNUM = #{EntCertNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHEETYEAR = #{SheetYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHEETTYPE = #{SheetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHEETTYPEDIVIDE = #{SheetTypeDivide,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RPTDATE = #{RptDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CASHFLOWSDLTSEQNO = #{CashFlowsDltSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select CASHFLOWSDLTSEQNO, INFRECTYPE, ENTNAME, ENTCERTTYPE, ENTCERTNUM, SHEETYEAR, SHEETTYPE, SHEETTYPEDIVIDE, RPTDATE from PBCRS_REPORT_CASHFLOWSDLT where CASHFLOWSDLTSEQNO = #{CashFlowsDltSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
